resources.string: Winning Conditions: Town wins if all the mafia, the werewolf, serial killer, and witch are dead. Mafia wins if all the town, the werewolf, serial killer, and witch are dead. The werewolf wins if everyone is dead (the jesters, executioner, and pirate can be spared). The serial killer wins if everyone is dead (the jesters, executioner, and pirate can be spared). The jester wins if he/she is lynched, and the executioner wins if their target is lynched. The pirate wins if he/she wins two duels. If one of these conditions is not met, then it is a draw.
